name: Kalshi
headline: 1st federally regulated exchange where people can trade on events
description:
Kalshi (www.kalshi.com) is the first federally regulated exchange where you can trade on the outcome of events.  We built Kalshi because we believe that people should be able to capitalize on what they know and have opinions on. We make this possible by expanding what people can trade on and allowing them trade in the domain of everyday knowledge. 

Kalshi is developing a new asset class, “event contracts,” and a financial exchange for trading on the outcome of events: we are federally regulated by the CFTC as the first-ever legal futures exchange in the U.S. for trading on a broad category of events.

Kalshi is on a mission to redefine how we think about trading by offering a platform where you can speculate on the outcome of real-world events. Founded in 2019 and based in New York, Kalshi stands out as the first federally regulated exchange of its kind in the U.S., sanctioned by the CFTC. They’re breaking new ground with their innovative product—a new asset class called “event contracts”—that taps into the knowledge and opinions people already have about various scenarios in everyday life.

Imagine being able to trade on the outcome of events ranging from politics and sports to economics and technology. Kalshi enables that, allowing users to put their insights and predictions to work in a structured, legal framework. This means that whether you’re confident about the outcome of an election or have a hunch about market trends, there’s a way to leverage that confidence into tradeable assets.

The company came out of the Y Combinator W19 batch and boasts a team of around 50 employees. Michael Seibel, a prominent figure in the startup ecosystem, serves as their Group Partner. The idea here is simple yet profound: to democratize the ability to capitalize on knowledge, allowing individuals to engage in financial transactions that reflect their beliefs and insights.

So, if you're curious about how to translate your everyday predictions into potential profit, Kalshi could be the platform for you. You can explore more on their website at [kalshi.com](https://www.kalshi.com), where you’ll find markets across various categories, insight-driven forecasts, and a community of like-minded traders looking to navigate the future.
